properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the XMLImportPreference (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: If true, creates a link to the imported XML file. If false, embeds the file.
properties.name: createLinkToXML

properties.description: If true, repeating text elements inherit the formatting applied to placeholder text. Note: Valid only when import style is merge.
properties.name: repeatTextElements

properties.description: If true, ignores elements that do not match the existing structure. Note: Valid only when import style is merge.
properties.name: ignoreUnmatchedIncoming

properties.description: If true, imports text into tables if tags match placeholder tables and their cells. Note: Valid only when import style is merge.
properties.name: importTextIntoTables

properties.description: If true, leaves existing content in place if the matching XML content contains only whitespace characters such as a carriage return or a tab character. Note: Valid only when import style is merge.
properties.name: ignoreWhitespace

properties.description: If true, deletes existing elements or placeholders in the document that do not have matches in the XML file. Note: Valid only when import style is merge.
properties.name: removeUnmatchedExisting

properties.description: If true, imports into the selected XML element. If false, imports at the root element.
properties.name: importToSelected

properties.description: The style of incorporating imported XML content into the document.
properties.name: importStyle

properties.description: If true, transforms the XML using an XSLT file.
properties.name: allowTransform

properties.description: The name of the XSLT file. Note: Valid when allow transform is true. Can return: File or XMLTransformFile enumerator.
properties.name: transformFilename

properties.description: Stylesheet parameters as a list of name/value pairs in the format [[name, value], [name, value], ...]. Can return: Ordered array containing name:String, value:String.
properties.name: transformParameters

properties.description: If true, imports CALS tables as InDesign tables.
properties.name: importCALSTables

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLImportPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
